Title: Multi-Project Templates with Wizard: Visual Studio 2010 Sample
Description: This project shows you simple example of creating multi-project templates with wizard using Visual Studio 2010, which generates VSIX file. A VSIX file enables us to install Visual Studio extensions (tools, controls, template etc) with a single click.

Project Description
